The_DD principle_JJ of_II this_DD method_NN is_VBZ to_TO calculate_VVI the_DD second_JJ derivative_NN of_II the_DD likelihood_NN and_CC to_TO select_VVI the_DD number_NN of_II classes_NNS for_II which_PNR this_DD derivative_NN exceeds_VVZ a_DD threshold_NN which_PNR is_VBZ set_NN to_II 0.5_MC in_II practice_NN ._. 
 The principle of this method is to calculate the second derivative of the likelihood and to select the number of classes for which this derivative exceeds a threshold which is set to 0.5 in practice .

For_II instance_NN +_SYM A_NN +_SYM B_NN ?_SYM C_NN means_NNS that_PNR C_NN is_VBZ downregulated_VVN when_CS A_NN and_CC B_NN are_VBB upregulated_VVN +_SYM B_NN ?_MC +_SYM A_NN means_NNS that_PNR A_NN is_VBZ upregulated_VVN if_CST B_NN was_VBD upregulated_VVN for_II example_NN in_II the_DD previous_JJ time_NN point_NN for_II the_DD time_NN series_NN ?_NNP A_NNP ?_NNP B_NNP ?_NNP ?_NNP C_NN means_NNS that_PNR positive_JJ change_NN in_II the_DD expression_NN level_NN of_II A_DD along_RR with_II simultaneous_JJ negative_JJ change_NN in_II expression_NN of_II B_NN coincides_VVZ with_II simultaneous_JJ negative_JJ change_NN of_II C_NN expression_NN ?_CS+ B_CS+ ?_CS+ ?_CS A_DD means_NNS that_PNR positive_JJ change_NN in_II expression_NN level_NN of_II B_NN precedes_VVZ negative_JJ change_NN of_II A_DD expression_NN ._. 
 For instance +A+B? C means that C is downregulated when A and B are upregulated +B?+A means that A is upregulated if B was upregulated for example in the previous time point for the time series ?A?B??C means that positive change in the expression level of A along with simultaneous negative change in expression of B coincides with simultaneous negative change of C expression ?B??A means that positive change in expression level of B precedes negative change of A expression .

Bland_NNP Altman_NNP 12_MC argue_VVB that_CST two_MC methods_NNS designed_VVN to_TO measure_VVI the_DD same_JJ thing_VVGN will_VM inevitably_RR give_VVB a_DD positive_JJ linear_JJ regression_NN and_CC the_DD most_RRT useful_JJ comparison_NN is_VBZ gained_VVN by_II plotting_VVGN the_DD difference_NN between_II the_DD measures_NNS against_II the_DD mean_NN of_II the_DD two_MC measures_NNS ._. 
 Bland Altman 12 argue that two methods designed to measure the same thing will inevitably give a positive linear regression and the most useful comparison is gained by plotting the difference between the measures against the mean of the two measures .
